comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #690476 +++

We try to support the use of |s instead of :s in Windows file URLs. However if the URL goes through any sort of serialisation the | will be escaped to %7C causing the URL to fail to deserialise to the same path as the original URL.

I don't know whether the bug is that the | gets escaped to %7C or whether it is that the escaped URL fails to map to the same path.

+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #690476 +++

We try to support the use of |s instead of :s in Windows file URLs. However if the URL goes through any sort of serialisation the | will be escaped to %7C causing the URL to fail to deserialise to the same path as the original URL.

I don't know whether the bug is that the | gets escaped to %7C or whether it is that the escaped URL fails to map to the same path.
